rules_text:
{T}: Target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 4/4 blue and green Minion artifact creature until end of turn.
Team [i](Cast either side or both. When you cast both, the back is a token. Tokens don't have signatures.)[/i]
rules_text2: {T}: Put two +1/+1 counters on each noncreature non-Vehicle artifact you control.
flavor_text2: [i]Sapentia's arrival made Iroishi's greatest villains into reluctant heroes.[/i]
